name: LOLI RACING
description:
《LOLI RACING》is a Japanese-style kart racing game, the overall operation difficulty is low and easy to get started, only need to control the direction and drift easy arrive to the finish line.

Players can choose to race alone or invite friends to race together.

The racing tracks you can play have many different themes to choose from, such as shrines and historic site in Japan, pedestrian hell in Taiwan, or future cities full of high technology.

Players can choose their favorite characters and karts, and the performance and appearance of each kart are different.

Performance is divided into speed, acceleration, steering, drift, while appearance will vary according to the character's style.

Currently supported game content:
▶Single player and multiplayer
▶Chat room (lobby only)
▶38 tracks
▶15 characters and karts
▶Two game modes
